Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external

Supports operations outside of the MIWT environment, such as saving resources to disk, opening an URL, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExternalAction
    Base class for all external commands.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExternalQueue
    Queues ExternalAction objects, other objects that handle the external "world" could also be queued here.
    SaveResourceExternalAction
    Allows a resource to be saved.
    URLExternalAction
    An ExternalAction implementation that handles URL operations.
    ViewResourceExternalAction
    Allows a resource to be viewed with an appropriate external viewer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    URLExternalActionOperation
    Type-safe enumeration of the operations available for an URLExternalAction object.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external Description

Supports operations outside of the MIWT environment, such as saving resources to disk, opening an URL, etc. Use is simple, creating an instance of an ExternalAction subclass and then queue it in an ExternalQueue. The Component class has a queue() method for this purpose.
